## ResourceTypes.JsonResourceType.validate() method

Validates a JSON value for use as a complete resource instance value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
validate(json: JsonObject, completeness: 'full'): Result<JsonObject>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

json


</td><td>

JsonObject


</td><td>

The JSON value to validate.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

completeness


</td><td>

'full'


</td><td>

Describes [how complete](./ts-res.candidatecompleteness.md) the candidate value is.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;JsonObject&gt;

`Success` with the strongly-typed resource value if the JSON is valid, `Failure` with an error message otherwise.
